Text: Re Your ScottPaulcom order confirmationSara I think weve found a way to ship to you in TX would you rather do that If so just send me back your TX shipping address Thanks Scott wrote Thank you for your order with Scott Paul Wines Please keep this email for your records PRODUCT NAME PRICE QTY SUBTOTAL Pisoni Vineyard Pinot Noir SubTotal Tax Shipping Grand Total Your shipping information is as follows Email Name Michael McKeogh Address Poydras Street Address Suite City New Orleans State Louisiana Zip Our wines are on a firstcome firstserved basis so kindly mail your check promptly We may be unable to fulfill your order if payment is not received by November th Also include with your check a copy of this email or the printout when you ordered your wine online The Chardonnay is scheduled to ship the week of November th The Pinot Noir Pisoni Vineyard is scheduled to ship in late March Please note that shipping dates may be subject to change should we encounter extreme weather conditions that may adversely affect the wines If you have any questions please contact us via email or call us direct at Thank you again Martha and Scott Wright Proprietors Scott Paul Wines LLC
